thread.title: BRIEF-Italy to sell up to 6.25 billion euros in bonds on Friday
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Italy to sell up to 6.25 billion euros in bonds on Friday | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Italy to sell up to 6.25 billion euros in bonds on Friday
text:
July 27 Italy's Treasur says:
* To offer 4.75-6.25 billion euros over three bonds at July 30 auction
* To offer 1.50-2.00 billion euros of five-year BTP bond maturing May 1, 2020
* To offer 2.00-2.50 billion euros of 10-year BTP bond maturing June 1, 2025
* To offer 1.25-1.75 billion euros of CCTeu certificates maturing June 15, 2022 (Reporting by Milan Newsroom)
